ValidationRule.description: Requires that a Serial Number be entered for any Demo Conversion lines or children of Demo Conversion lines
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(
AND( TEXT(Appliance_Line_Type__c)="Demo conversion", (ISBLANK(SBCF_Serial_Number__c) || ISBLANK(Revised_Serial__c))), AND( TEXT(SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Appliance_Line_Type__c)="Demo conversion", ISBLANK(SBCF_Serial_Number__c)) ) && Business_Group__c="Core" && Quote_Type__c = 'Quote'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Missing Serial Number(s) for a Demo Conversion. In the Quote Line Drawers, select 'Revised Serial' to access the Demo Conversion lines.
